data: Hey! I'm Max, and I am thrilled to share my passion for full-stack development through my portfolio. I am a computer science student at EPITA, and my interest in technology led me to explore multiple areas of study, including quantum computing.

As a self-driven individual, I am always looking for ways to challenge myself, and that's why I'm pursuing quantum studies alongside my computer science degree. Quantum computing has been a fascinating field for me, and I enjoy learning about the underlying principles that allow for the creation of faster and more efficient algorithms.

But, I am not just interested in quantum computing. I am also a creative person who loves to spend their free time working on various projects. Whether it's designing new user interfaces, building interactive websites, or creating multimedia content, I always find joy in exploring new ways to express my creativity.

With regards to my technical skills, I have experience with several programming languages, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. I am always eager to learn new technologies and frameworks that can help me build better, more robust applications.

My portfolio showcases some of my best work in full-stack development, including web applications, custom APIs, and interactive interfaces. I believe that my experience in quantum studies and my creative background have given me a unique perspective that I can bring to the table.
